de.uni.leipzig.asv.zitationsgraph.db

Class DBLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni.leipzig.asv.zitationsgraph.db.DBLoader

  • public class DBLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages all MySQL related tasks in the project. JDBC is used to connect to a given MySQL server (db.conf).
    Author:
    Sascha Haseloff
